channel.title: Hi, Everyone! on Thijs Overmeer
channel.description: Recent content in Hi, Everyone! on Thijs Overmeer

item.title: Project 2: Kubeflow
item.description: Building kubeflow pipeline for predicting the number in the mnist dataset. Link to GitHub Reposistory

item.title: Project 1: BAS Trucks
item.description: In the first semester, while studying at JADS, we made a dashboard for BAS trucks, which could predict in which certain vehicles were going to be sold. Unfortunately, this project’s code included sensitive information, thus can not be included here. BAS Trucks

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact or follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/thijs-overmeer/ GitHub: https://github.com/thijsovermeer Gmail: thijsovermeer@gmail.com
